item.title: Feedback on my new song!
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
It’s got a decent, Summery groove — and a good first song.
I think it would benefit from a bit more development, including adding a few changes in structure along the way — to change up the vibe a bit during — or at least, to break up the repetitiveness of that part (it’s the hook that you end on, which runs throughout almost the entire track).

I also think the heavy bassline could be dropped back a bit or developed so there’s more movement over more bars. That repeating 1-bar bassline only adds to the sense of lack of movement, imo.

Still, tidy for a first song.

Read full topic
